page.title: 02Clubs
page.content: {1st Stubbington Scouts-}Our Scouts is held on Thursday.It is from 7.00pm to 9.00pm.The Hall is along Bells Lane. The uniform is a green shirt,green beret,green and white neckerchief, brown leather twisted woggle,belt, mushroom coloured trousers and black hard shoes. We have three leaders that run the group.The activities we have are badge work,hikes,camps,widegames, we have indoor games in the winter and outdoor games in the summer. We have a troop of about 25 people. Skip leads the whole troop. We have a sub each month which we have to pay. We also have parade in front of the flag and Baden Powell. We have one more Scout troop,2 Cub packs and one Venture unit. There is also another group called 2nd Stubbington.
